item.title: Emacs Key Bindings
item.description: Emacs Key Biddings # C-x reserved for Emacs native essential keybindings: buffer, window, frame, file, directory, etcâ€¦ C-c reserved for user and major mode: C-c letter reserved for user. <F5>-<F9> reserved for user.
